app:org.civicrm.profile.title: Site Profile
app:org.civicrm.profile.desc:
Prepare a technical profile of your site which can be shared in support, forums, issues, etc.
Details will be relayed through civicrm.org. Identifying information (such as URLs) will be confidential.

perm.desc: The site profile loads general technical information, such as the version of PHP and the list of CiviCRM extensions.
